Articles.Content: Mine was pretty good, a bit chilly outside.

My day was boring, until through the magic of hitting buttons repeatedly I got this 9.5Ghz overclock...

I didn't actually hammer away at my keyboard, no keyboards were harmed in the doing of this...
Today i bought a can of Dr Pepper, i liked the taste and later on i went out and bought a two-litre bottle, after drinking it all i have gas and a fast heart-rate, this was the highlight of my day.
Hopefully tonight i will have my gmod ports open!

Hopefully tonight i will have my gmod ports open!
What's your server's name and when can I join? You can reply to me in PM if you don't wanna tell specifics to everybody.

I saw some moron trying to break into my building through the security feed at work.

*radio*

*Security team comes in and handles the problem*

Mostly boring, occasionally hilarious and satisfying.

Pretty normal, woke up had breakfast and went to school cqlame home at 3pm, had a coffee and cleaned the fridge Ã‚Â».Ã‚Â« that took me the rest of the evening. After that I played some Lego barman with my brother and played little of KSP Usual day for me ^^

Woke up filled with energy and a feeling to work on all things I had planned, work, study, some cleaning. Woke up early, watched some news and everything was good. Untill I headed downstairs.

Found the cat pissing on one of the kitchen counters, missed my train due to cleaning that up. Found out that my dad took my sandwiches I left in the fridge. and to make my day complete I got a huge headache. First time in 2 years I took pain relievers . Stayed in bed all day with my head exploding.

Bumpety?

I'm having a mini-heart attack because my first college midterm is in half an hour.

Did some gardening.

Had to wipe computer

Bumpety?

I'm having a mini-heart attack because my first college midterm is in half an hour.

Better not stay here too long! Best of luck!

Today, I watched Navy vessels from all over the world enter into Sydney harbour as part of the international navy review. It was pretty cool.

Bumpety?

I'm having a mini-heart attack because my first college midterm is in half an hour.

I know the feeling *rolls into foetal position as I ignore all my adulthood responsabilities*

So far today I've been to the dentist, grabbed some well deserved Timmies then came back home and here I am waiting for my class only at 3pm and then I have an 8h shift tonight, yaaay.

(I have to brag a bit.)

Went across the country to see the premiere of Gravity in IMAX 3D. Spent a small fortune, ate very little, got my ass freezed a couple of times, slept only few hours in two days. Tried KSP on absolutely all maxed details and flawless framerate.

It was great. A man has to afford stuff like this every now at least once a year.
I got an A* in a Chemistry test so I am feeling pretty exultant, although on the 12th, I'm going to http://www.sci-fi-london.com/festival/2013/oktoberfest/programme/event/starshiplondon
School, tried giving my IT teacher a keyboard as a gift, hugged a lot of girls, seen "Gravity", played KSP and other games.

Weekdays: wake up at 6:30 am >_<. Have breakfast, bathe, go to school at 8:30 am or 9:00 am sometimes. School work and more work. Come home at 3:30 pm. Do homework. Play KSP until 10:00 pm. Bed

Weekends: wake up at 12:00 pm . Have breakfast. Play KSP until 3:00 pm. Eat lunch. Continue until 9:00 pm. Play roblox until 11:00 pm. Bed

Same old same old
Good, I finally had a good night's rest, after a week of 2-3 hours sleep at night, 2-3 hours sleep in the afternoon.
Awesome, got flipped off by a woman in a hotrod on the way to work. Got some KSP in when i got back, and i'm about to eat some Philly steak sandwiches.

Alright guys, after much discussion through the moderation team, we decided to reopen this thread.

Just remember to stay specifically on topic and not derive too far from it, else we will close it again if we see it actually turns into a chat thread.

Cheers!

I was out at the airfield where i'm training for a recreational pilots licence. Only minutes before preparing for my own flight, i witnessed a plane crash from a forced/emergency landing (the engine stopped in circuit) that didn't work out. Good news is the pilot and passenger survived, with injuries. They were lucky, it certainly looked fatal. They were taken to hospital via ambulance helicopter.

Later in the evening at my local pub, after finishing my first beer while contemplating my choice of hobby. I headed back to the bar... my foot caught behind chair leg... tripped, and had an epic fall. Grazed both knees, and an elbow pretty bad, and what i'm certain feels to be a cracked rib.

So that's my day (actually, the above was yesterday.. today i replaced my shower curtain and bought some new bags for my vacuum cleaner, but I thought i'd mention yesterday instead because it was more interesting).
Trying to fix the ksp horrid FPS 1
